meanings.definition: A network of stacked membrane-bound compartments found in plant cells, involved in the processing and packaging of proteins.
meanings.sent1: The dictyosomes in the plant cells help in packaging proteins efficiently.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study dictyosomes to understand how plant cells process proteins.
meanings.sent3: The dictyosomes in the plant cells are like busy little factories packaging proteins.
meanings.sent4: The dictyosomes work tirelessly like tiny assembly lines in the plant cells.
meanings.sent5: The dictyosomes resemble organized stacks of tiny boxes processing proteins.

meanings.definition: The organelle responsible for the formation of cell wall components in plant cells.
meanings.sent1: Plant cells rely on dictyosomes to build their strong cell walls.
meanings.sent2: The dictyosomes play a crucial role in constructing the plant cell walls.
meanings.sent3: The dictyosomes are like the architects of the plant cell walls.
meanings.sent4: Dictyosomes are the builders that create the protective cell walls of plants.
meanings.sent5: The dictyosomes are the masterminds behind the sturdy plant cell walls.
